channel.title: Music – Del Shannon
channel.description: Recent content in Del Shannon on Music

item.title: Del Shannon - Runaway
item.description:
작곡: D.Shannon & M.Crook / 작사: Words & Music by
KY: 8185 / KY: 7026

As I walk along
I wonder
What went wrong
with our love
A love that was
so strong
And as I still
walk on
I think of the things
we’ve done together
While our hearts
were young
I’m a- walking
in the rain
Tears are falling
and I feel the pain
Wishing you were
here by me
To end this misery
I wonder
Wo wo wo wo wonder
why why why why why
Why she ran away
and I wonder
Where she will stay
my little runaway
Run run run run
runaway-

I’m a- walking
in the rain
Tears are falling
and I feel the pain
Wishing you were
here by me
To end this misery
I wonder
Wo wo wo wo wonder
why why why why why
Why she ran away
and I wonder
Where she will stay
my little runaway
Run run run run
runaway
Run run run run
runaway
Run run run run
runaway-
